entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
